name: Spiderbite 2
description:
The nearly unrequested sequel to the html game you felt weird playing is finally here! Welcome to early access Spiderbite 2!

Complete with...

  • Tons of new enemies
  • Loadout customization
  • Hats
  • The ability to watch grass grow
  • I mentioned hats, right?

Play for free! Play it now! Do it. Play it.
